info.description: These endpoints are specific to Xero Files API
info.title: Xero Files API

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options,

FileId.description: The unique identifier of the file

ObjectGroup.description: The Object Group that the object is in. These roughly correlate to the endpoints that can be used to retrieve the object via the core accounting API.

ObjectId.description: The identifier of the object that the file is being associated with (e.g. InvoiceID, BankTransactionID, ContactID)

get.summary: Retrieves an association object using a unique object ID

parameters.description: pass an optional page size value
parameters.name: pagesize

parameters.description: number of records to skip for pagination
parameters.name: page

MimeType.description: MimeType of the file (image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf, etc..)

Name.description: Key is Name, but returns Email address of user who created the file

parameters.description: pass an optional folder id to save file to specific folder
parameters.name: FolderId

name.description: exact name of the file you are uploading

MimeType.description: MimeType of the file (image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf, etc..)

Name.description: Key is Name, but returns Email address of user who created the file

application/json.example: [ { "type":"Validation", "title":"Validation failure", "detail":"Extension: boo is not a valid File extension." } ]

204.description: Successful deletion - return response 204 no content

MimeType.description: MimeType of the file (image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf, etc..)

Name.description: Key is Name, but returns Email address of user who created the file

get.summary: Retrieves a file by a unique file ID

put.description: Updates file properties of a single file

MimeType.description: MimeType of the file (image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf, etc..)

Name.description: Key is Name, but returns Email address of user who created the file

MimeType.description: MimeType of the file (image/png, image/jpeg, application/pdf, etc..)

Name.description: Key is Name, but returns Email address of user who created the file

application/json.example: [ { "type":"Rename", "title":"Rename failed", "detail":"Unable to rename efd77bfc-7018-4da1-b251-7aa2d438382c to FooBar" } ]

get.summary: Retrieves the content of a specific file

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for available folders

Email.description: The email address used to email files to the inbox. Only the inbox will have this element.

FileCount.description: The number of files in the folder

Id.description: Xero unique identifier for a folder  Files

IsInbox.description: to indicate if the folder is the Inbox. The Inbox cannot be renamed or deleted.

post.description: By passing in the appropriate properties, you can create a new folder

scopes.email: Grant read-only access to your email
scopes.files: Grant read-write access to files and folders
scopes.files.read: Grant read-only access to files and folders
scopes.openid: Grant read-only access to your open id
